title: 104_hr2829
content: Urges the Department of State to make the release of Chinese imprisoned or detained on religious grounds a major objective of US foreign policy with China. Prohibits the Department of State, the US Information Agency, the Agency for International Development, or any other Federal agency or entity from obligating or expending funds for the participation of certain Chinese individuals and organizations in any conference, exchange program, or activity relating to education, culture, training, or any other purpose, until the President certifies to the Congress that specified imprisoned or detained Chinese citizens have been unconditionally released by the Chinese Government.
